arguments.value: Upgrade can only be initiated by the existing governor.

devdoc.details: Note: the complete upgrade process requires more than just the transactions in this contract. These are only the ones that need to be performed atomically.

params._setMigratedAddress: the address to set migrated. This address will be able to continue making calls to                            old voting contract (used to claim rewards on others' behalf). Note: this address                            can always be changed by the voters.

upgrade().details: This method updates the Voting address in the finder, sets the old voting contract to migrated state, and returns ownership of the existing Voting contract and Finder back to the Governor.

devdoc.title: A contract that executes a short series of upgrade calls that must be performed atomically as a part of the upgrade process for Voting.sol.

methods.constructor: Removes an address from the whitelist.

upgrade().notice: Performs the atomic portion of the upgrade process.
